title: Ep. 213 - Football Player Is Acquitted Of Rape Charges But His Life Is Still Destroyed
description:
Today on the show, a former star football player has finally been found not guilty of rape charges, but the accusations have permanently damaged him. We’ll discuss. Also, the Girl Scouts go all in on abortion advocacy. Finally, why is it that really successful people often do poorly in school? Date: 03-07-2019
